website_summaries.verdict: Miles from cutting edge, but affordable VR fun. Games can be as close as your Sony game console with a Playstation VR headset.
pros: Easy to hookup and set up
If you've already got a camera for your PS4 you're good to go
The picture quality is a step or two down from HTC or Oculus, but the low price and vast game selection compensates
cons: Camera and motion sensors sold separately

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE IN USA
customer_reviews.text: It is not compatible in the US, which was NOT disclosed when I purchased it. They have since put the disclosure which is nice to see. They are also not making it easy to return the item. Took to post office and cost to return was over $200!
customer_reviews.author: ProfessionalShopper

customer_reviews.title: Missrepresented product, game vouchers doesnt work in US.
customer_reviews.text: When we set up the apparently the vouchers for the 5 games only work in Europe not in the United States so the vouchers for the games are useless herein the US. Also the power plug is for Europe not US. So basically spent alot of money for something that we cant use. Miss represented product. If we buy the games that 4 games that came with the bundle that's another around $100. I honestly would like a refund
customer_reviews.author: Clint Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Should not be sold in US
customer_reviews.text: I found out too late that this product was coming from England. Figured it wasn't a big deal and just purchased a compatible cord and switched it out. The VR works just fine with the American cord, However, None of the game codes work in the US. Merry Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the critics!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where all the fuss is coming from for this product? I got this for my 8 year son for Christmas, he pretty much set it up all by himself. He also downloaded all the games off the PlayStation Store without issues. So far it’s been awesome. I think it should come with the move controllers but I should have read more about. All in all it’s awesome and definitely a great deal with all the games it came with.
customer_reviews.author: FrankM

customer_reviews.title: No controllers
customer_reviews.text: It never said it would come with controllers but it's the mega bundle I feel It should right?
customer_reviews.author: Trishalynn

customer_reviews.title: PS4 vr
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift so not sure. I get these rating questions when most of times it is for gift so how is one rate them when I don’t use it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Just like this description
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews on this product after I already have made an order. To tell you the truth, it sketched me out and I almost wanted to cancel it. It finally got delivered and everything came as it was described in the description. All games came and worked on my playstation. All 5 Full games and also Demo disc 3 was in there. I noticed it was the 2nd version of the VR too. Definitely happy with my product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: My set needs to be completed!
customer_reviews.text: My purchase was not complete. I did not receive the A/C power cord, or the VR controllers. Missing these items make it impossible to play. These are listed in my booklet of included items. I bought this pack brand new and therefore everything should have been in the box, after all it is a mega pack. This is why my star level is so low. I paid over $320.00 for this and I expect to get what I paid for, and I get it missing a key component. Who packed this, millennials?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money personally considering you have to purchase controllers separate
customer_reviews.text: Cost way to much to not include the move controllers but it is an awesome experience just is really expensive and don’t include motion controllers
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Barnes

customer_reviews.title: UK POWER CORD/GAME CODES DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: You would think the word BUNDLE meant that it included everything you’ll need but it does not include the controllers. Not the biggest issue.... the power cord it comes with does not fit into a US outlet and the game codes do not work in the US... I’m so upset with myself for not reading the reviews first!!! Please don’t waste your money on this you WILL get ripped off!!! If you noticed the stars that they get for good reviews are from customers from UK.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our 16 year old son for Christmas and the whole family has loved it. So much fun! I didn’t realize I needed the motion controllers for some games (my fault as I didn’t do my research). So that’s an added cost. But loads of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Brashear

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed and seeking refund
customer_reviews.text: The description that this product has says it comes with everything needed for a VR experience. Then it arrives and there are no wireless controls? This. is not everything you need. The seller claim it states that in the description but it does not. I also did not receive the games that were supposed to come as part of the bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaal Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked perfectly. The only reason for the 4 stars is that for a mega pack, it did not come with the wands
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: It's good game but the headset quit working
customer_reviews.text: it's work in firstday and the next day when I turn it on, hear the beep and then eventually it boots me out the system tells me "VR headset disconnected". I've tried it several times now and noticed that only the lights on the back of the headset light up after pressing the power button. I did all possible I can to trouble shoot even look in YouTube for remedy still not working.
customer_reviews.author: RDB

customer_reviews.title: If U Dont live in Uk dont buy no games for U.S.A only uk codes with system even with U.S.A adapter
customer_reviews.text: If u dont live in uk then it has no games with it i live us and code dont work to receive games online like it says on box
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: where is my refund?
customer_reviews.text: Product was not good and the power unit is not compatible with US. Not in a good functioning state. I have requested refund and the shipment came from GB which should have alerted me before buying. I had to pay nearly $100 to ship it back. Bad!
customer_reviews.author: Maru Bedaso

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Son said it's perfect has not had any issues to date
customer_reviews.author: Lesia

customer_reviews.title: Nice VR But...
customer_reviews.text: Games vouchers are not US Compatible and this is not advised prior to purchase, also plugs are UK plugs so you would need an adapter. I got an adapter for like 10 bucks. Stinks I had to repurchase some games as this was a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and he really was excited for the Resident Evil game.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This was the second VR I purchased it seems to not last very long!!! I took very good care of this item but it definitely needs to be revamped ESPECIALLY THE HEADSET AND CORD!!! The main issue!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zingale

customer_reviews.title: System made for UK not America
customer_reviews.text: The "5 games" the product came with are not accessible and the system comes with different cords. I couldn't return the product cuz I was being charged $100 to ship it back. Overall im unhappy because I can't use it and couldn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathely Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not for use in US.
customer_reviews.text: Not for use in the US. Comes with UK cables and game codes won't work on US PS profile.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY if you live in the US
customer_reviews.text: Game vouchers are region locked and do not work if you live outside the UK
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Newton

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE FOR USE IN THE US!!!
customer_reviews.text: The game codes will not work in the US! Nothing states this in the description...bought it and am returning! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JPO

customer_reviews.title: Inability to load 5 games-can’t be used!
customer_reviews.text: Gift given to my son who has thus far been unable to load the five games bought in this package 📦. If he continues to not be able to load with PlayStation support I plan to send this back. Very disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: Mikel L. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: codes plug
customer_reviews.text: i bought cuz i seen someone got the codes to work is the usa but mine didnt could always make another account but im not payin for plus twice didnt care about plug adapter was 10bucks good price if the games codes worked everywhere
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Product was as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Virtual reality is wonderful and all the games are great. We enjoy it tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Favors

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise and fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my teenage son for Christmas. We also bought Beatsaver (sp?). So far, we are about a month in and no problems! I’ve never seen him this active before! Great tool to get the kids off the couch!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: games codes not for usa
customer_reviews.text: Package got here earlier than expected, however I paid extra fro the five add on games and all of the codes said they had been used or they were for European consoles. So I paid 200 dollars extra for no reason, also the move controllers not included
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: When my son tried to download the games from the voucher code, they wouldn't work or said the codes had expired. This is very disappointing to a child thats just got a new game, a very disappointing to me for the amount of money it cost. VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Getting A response back when you email them
customer_reviews.text: I have emailed twice and still have not got a response about getting a US Plug to replace the UK plug. Also, I saw where the game codes only work in the UK, not in the US. Not sure and I hope it does.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R Corum

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH PRICE
customer_reviews.text: The box showed up all beat up. It is NOT a full bundle; NO PS4 machine. Codes for games didnt work and one was even expired. Ridiculous price for what we actually got that worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with all ps4 models.
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with older ps4. The description did not specify must be slim or newer model to plug into.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Woody

customer_reviews.title: No games
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come with the game vouchers like it says. Not happy at all, this bundle was extra due to the games that was supposed to be provided.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Only for the UK
customer_reviews.text: This system is only for the UK. If you live anywhere outside the UK you will not be able to use this system.
customer_reviews.author: MomSaidNo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product. The Mega Pack codes were invalid and the power adapter was not made for use in America.
customer_reviews.author: Harris Bouchillon

customer_reviews.title: cheapest I found it
customer_reviews.text: This item was well worth the money, came earlier than expected. love it, can't wait to show my son when he comes to visit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We really have enjoyed this. It was easy to connect everything went smoothly. Lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: AshJW

customer_reviews.title: Buy it where you can test it
customer_reviews.text: Could not display to tv. All games in bundle didn’t work emailed customer support no response
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I'm pissed off
customer_reviews.text: Well I like my vr, my vr was a mega pack some one either used my vouchers for my games but the codes don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Our children love it. They love the games that came in the bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 12 year old!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this product. He never wants to sit it down.
customer_reviews.author: happy mom

customer_reviews.title: For amazo help ??
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that the code # don't work and the vr was broken
customer_reviews.author: Billy Gutierrez

product_meta.title: PlayStation VR Mega Pack (PS4)
product_meta.description: Platform:New Mega Pack| Edition:No additional itemsDiscover truly breath-taking virtual reality worlds with over 200 amazing games and experiences with PlayStation VR. Powered by cutting-edge technology, PlayStation VR transports players from their homes into the heart of incredibly immersive virtual reality games and experiences. Through stunning visuals, 3D audio and intuitive controls, PlayStation VR players live out their most epic gaming dreams - from high-octane racing and battling dragons, to exploring deep space and coming face-to-face with nerve-shredding horror. Jump into over 200 breath-taking virtual reality games and experiences with PlayStation VR.
feature_bullets: Discover virtual reality worlds with over 200 games and experiences with PlayStation VR
powered by cutting-edge technology, PlayStation VR transports players from their homes into the heart of immersive virtual reality games and experiences

through High visuals, 3D audio and intuitive controls, PlayStation VR players live out their epic gaming dreams - from high-octane racing and battling dragons, to exploring deep space and coming face-to-face with nerve-shredding horror
with everything you need to get started in one box - PlayStation VR headset and PlayStation Camera
includes 5 game download codes: VR Worlds, ASTRO Bot rescue mission, Skyrim VR, everybodys golf, Resident Evil 7

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars562 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
